snp1.4:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme.
snp1.4:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgalasatāni payuttāni honti vappakāle.
snp1.4:3.4: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto tenupasaṅkami.
snp1.4:3.5: Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati.
snp1.4:3.6: Atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami;
snp1.4:4.1: Addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ.
snp1.4:4.3: “ahaṃ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:4.5: Tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca;
snp1.4:5.1: “Ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:5.3: “Na kho pana mayaṃ passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā phālaṃ vā pācanaṃ vā balībadde vā.
snp1.4:5.4: Atha ca pana bhavaṃ gotamo evamāha:
snp1.4:5.5: ‘ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca;
snp1.4:6.1: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
snp1.4:12.1: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyasaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavato upanāmesi:
snp1.4:12.4: yañhi bhavaṃ gotamo amatapphalaṃ kasiṃ kasatī”ti.
snp1.4:15.1: “Atha kassa cāhaṃ, bho gotama, imaṃ pāyasaṃ dammī”ti?
snp1.4:15.2: “Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā.
snp1.4:15.3: Tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, taṃ pāyasaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī”ti.
snp1.4:16.1: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyasaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpesi.
snp1.4:16.2: Atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
snp1.4:16.3: Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃ santatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati;
snp1.4:16.4: evamevaṃ so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.
snp1.4:17.1: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp1.4:17.2: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp1.4:17.4: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
snp1.4:17.5: evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
snp1.4:17.6: Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṃghañca, labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadan”ti.
snp1.4:18.1: Alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alatthaupasampadaṃ.
snp1.4:18.2: Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamattoātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
snp1.4:18.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadevaagārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
snp1.4:18.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭhevadhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
snp1.4:18.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃbrahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
